Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Oil lamp
Description: Ovoid-shaped oil lamp with a broken extremity. A moulded design in relief has been applied to the convex upper section. A turtle is depicted in the middle with waves near the contours. The details of the decorative motifs have been incised. Flattened base. The central section of the lamp is pierced by a circular hole.
